Data Trend Snapshot

A single-file web app for quick data visualization and reporting from CSV/JSON uploads with print-friendly dashboards.

FEATURES
- Upload CSV or JSON files; parse and display in real-time
- Auto-detect numeric columns and generate line, bar, and scatter charts using Chart.js
- Responsive grid layout showing multiple chart types simultaneously
- Dark/light theme toggle with system preference detection (prefers-color-scheme)
- Print-friendly view: hide controls, optimize colors and spacing for paper output
- Keyboard navigation: Tab through file input, chart selection dropdowns, theme toggle, and print button
- ARIA labels on all interactive elements; role="region" for chart containers
- localStorage persistence: remember last uploaded file and theme preference
- Summary statistics panel: min, max, mean for each numeric column
- Column filter/selector: choose which columns to visualize
- One-file deployment: all CSS and JavaScript inline; no external dependencies except Chart.js via CDN

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS
- Single HTML file with inline CSS and JavaScript
- Chart.js library loaded from CDN (only external dependency)
- File parsing: native FileReader API for CSV (simple split/parse) and JSON
- localStorage for theme state and last dataset
- Semantic HTML5; WCAG 2.1 AA compliant keyboard and screen reader support
- Mobile responsive (viewport meta tag, flexbox layout)
- No build step; runs in any modern browser

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA
- User can upload CSV/JSON, see parsed data in table format
- At least 3 chart types render automatically from numeric columns
- Dark mode toggles and persists across sessions
- Print view removes navigation, adjusts colors to grayscale, maintains chart readability
- All buttons and dropdowns keyboard-accessible; Tab order logical
- ARIA labels prevent screen reader confusion on dynamic content
